stepAnswer: select the cell, then type $$"What-If$$ Assumptions" as a new row titles and click enter. Select the range and then $$copy-paste$$ it into the original cell
stepTitle: How does one copy a range of cells to a nonadjacent destination area?
choices: select the cell, then type $$"What-If$$ Assumptions" as a new row titles and click enter. Select the range and then $$copy-paste$$ it into the original cell
select the range and click on the $$what-if$$ button under the home tab
